html: HyperText Markup Language, used to define content structure.
css: Cascading Style Sheets, controls visual presentation of elements.
function: Reusable block of code that performs a specific task.
express: Node.js framework for building web applications and APIs.
middleware: Functions in Express that handle requests before response.
routing: Determining how server responds to client request paths.
api: Application Programming Interface â€” a way to communicate between systems.
